participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is cheerful and enjoys sharing her life experiences. She has a great sense of humor and appreciates the little joys in life.
participant_1.background: now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was a child. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. i like to dance.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is an active and family-oriented person. He loves spending time at the gym and enjoys cooking for his family, though he admits he's not the best cook.
participant_2.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.
